detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that flare gently to the hem with creases front and back.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Slim fit.
Alice band in fabric-covered plastic with chiffon flowers and tulle at the top.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Water bottle in stainless steel with a plastic screw top. 500 ml.
Hat in a soft, cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a narrow cut at the top and racer back. Relaxed fit.
Bracelet in antiqued metal with glass beads.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Blouse in sheer satin with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and low V-neck with decorative buttons at one side. Long sleeves with gathers and buttons at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hooded jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Body in crêpe jersey with a U-shaped decoration at the top, a detachable strap at the back of the neck, concealed silicone trim at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Kimono in a patterned linen and viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and concealed fastening at the front. Long balloon sleeves with cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Relaxed-fit, V-neck T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a seam down the back.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a square neckline and long sleeves.

Trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave. High waist with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and a zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, flap back pockets, and tapered legs with sewn-in creases.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with gently rounded cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Alice band with floral decorations on top.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Short vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a racer back.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover with ties and a concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Fitted jersey T-shirt in a soft viscose and cotton blend with embroidery and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Calf-length dress in a patterned, viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Jersey underskirt.
T-shirt in printed jersey.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a shirt front, collar, sewn-on bow tie, button placket, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections. High waist with a wide waist panel.

Sleeveless tulle dress with a double-layered skirt. Round neck with a small opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
Gently fitted jacket in a linen and viscose blend with no lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length, gathered sleeves. Lined.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined hood with a satin drawstring, long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, frill trim at the top, sewn-on tie belt and side pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a print motif. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
5-pocket, calf-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist and straight legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.

Pile-lined jacket in denim with worn details. Drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Buttoned cuffs and a tab and button at the sides.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Relaxed-fit tops in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a print motif on the front and a rounded hem with a fabric appliqué at the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Calf-length satin dress made from a silk and viscose blend in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps. Opening and ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable braces.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing at the top, a wide V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline that has an opening and concealed button at the back. Half-length sleeves with slits and ties, and a straight-cut hem.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Tunic in a plumeti-weave modal blend with a round neckline with an opening and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, narrow cuffs with a button, and seams in the lower section.

Long dress in an airy, patterned plumeti weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Jersey inner dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist.
Jacket with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with an adjustable tab and press-studs. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Metal earrings with fabric fringes.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy denim with a zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a mesh compartment at one side. Padded laptop sleeve, a zipped inner compartment and a padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 12x28x44 cm.
Oxford shoes in leather with closed lacing and toe caps. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shoes in imitation leather with decorative studs over the top, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft, striped cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Leather gloves. The tops of the thumb, index finger and middle finger have been treated to make them touchscreen-compatible. Lined.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
